translations: n.裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人

phrs.translation: 暴露狂, 娓娓道来, 小丑的姿态

sentences.sentence: Her behavior has become exhibitionist and totally out of character.
sentences.translation: 她的行为变成爱出风头，跟她正常的性格大不相同。

sentences.sentence: He's 26 now, and he works a full-time job, but he's a really, really BIG exhibitionist.
sentences.translation: 他今年26岁，他有一份全职工作。但是他是一个非常爱现的人。

sentences.sentence: So he said to the companion: Don't display! Don't become an exhibitionist, otherwise you will be in trouble.
sentences.translation: 于是他对朋友说，不要表现，不要成为一个展览品，不然你将会陷入麻烦。
